title: Grand 2 Bedroom plus den, two and a half bathroom with two balconies
description: Grand two bedroom plus den, two and a half bathroom with two balconies on one of the penthouse floors of The Wanamaker House! Rare opportunity to rent a grand two bedroom plus den, three bathroom with two private balconies on one of the highest floors of The Wanamaker House. This sun-soaked residence offers walls of windows showcasing views to the north, two spacious bedroom suites that enjoy their own baths and private balconies, and incredible natural light in all rooms. Enter through a foyer with tile flooring into the great room. The great room offers walls of windows with jaw-dropping city views, cozy fireplace, open living and dining areas, and access to the den. There is an updated eat-in kitchen with great cabinetry and counter space, black appliances and a breakfast nook. The luxurious primary suite enjoys two large walk-in closets, access to the first private terrace and an ensuite bath with soaking tub, stall shower and designer double vanity. The second private terrace is accessible via the second bedroom, which also features great closet space and ensuite bath with tub shower and oversized vanity. The third full bathroom is adjacent to the den and has a stall shower. From the amazing layout to the captivating city views, this is one home you don't want to miss! The Wanamaker House is located just off Rittenhouse Square, on Walnut Street between 20th and 21st streets. Residents of The Wanamaker House enjoy the 24-hour front desk, access to the roof top swimming pool, exercise room, sauna and on-site garage parking for a fee, subject to availability. Rittenhouse Square is ranked the 6th best neighborhood in North America by Places Rated Almanac. There are 175 restaurants and 199 retailers within a three block radius. The Wanamaker House is within walking distance to the Market Street office corridor, The Avenue of the Arts and University City. Amtrak 30th Street Station and Philadelphia International Airport are just minutes away.

This very bike-able location is a walker and rider's "paradise!" 5 blocks to Rittenhouse, easy access to PENN, CHOP, JEFF, all commuter rail lines. Sellers are including the balance of a prepaid, rented garage space just down the street
